tier_1_mandatory: Official brand T&Cs pages for each free bet offer (direct verification)
App Store reviews for mobile experience insights (iOS ratings and user feedback)
Google Play reviews for mobile experience insights (Android ratings and user feedback)
Reddit discussions about Irish free bets (r/irishgambling, r/sportsbook threads)
Trustpilot reviews for brand reputation in Ireland
tier_2_verification: Brand official websites for current offer amounts and terms
Irish Revenue / Department of Justice for licensing verification
Payment provider sites for deposit method confirmation
tier_4_sparingly: Competitor affiliate sites for research gaps ONLY
NEVER cite affiliate sites for pros/cons or recommendations

Reddit: 'Reddit users report [finding] across 15 threads in r/irishgambling'
